unnormalised: Hey Students, Scholarship Season is ON! Forget endless scrolling - scholarship portals are your new bestie!
normalised: Hey Students, Scholarship Season is ON! Forget endless scrolling - scholarship portals are your new bestie! Think of it as Swiggy for scholarships, but instead of biryani, you're getting funding for your dreams! These ed-tech platforms are popping up like Diwali lights, making finding financial aid way easier. Websites like 'Vidya Dhan' and 'Buddy4Study' are helping students across India, from Kashmir to Kanyakumari, discover opportunities. Heard about Rohan from I I T Delhi bagging a rupee five lakh scholarship through one of these portals? Inspiring, right? No more sifting through piles of paperwork or annoying visits to multiple college offices. Everything is online, just a few clicks away. Many portals even offer personalized recommendations based on your academic profile and location. Think your dream university is two thousand kilometer away and unaffordable? These portals might just surprise you! So, ditch the chai break procrastination and start exploring! Your education journey deserves all the support it can get! Remember, education is the lamp that lights up our future!
